imdb.title: Chôjikû Yôsai Macross
imdb.plot: An alien spaceship crash lands on Earth and her secrets lead to a desperate war against an alien enemy sent to retrieve the ship.

episodes.title: Booby Trap
episodes.plot: The launch ceremony for the rebuilt alien space battleship Macross is interrupted by the arrival of the alien Zentradi forces as well as a booby trap in the Macross itself. A civilian pilot named Hikaru Ichijo is drawn into the conflict.

episodes.title: Countdown
episodes.plot: Hikaru and Roy try a bold rescue mission.

episodes.title: Space Fold
episodes.plot: The Captain of the Macross is forced to make a quick decision due to the relentless attackes of the enemy. Using alien technology, the Macross makes a space fold near the Earth's surface above South Ataria island.

episodes.title: Lynn Minmay
episodes.plot: The fold systems have vanished and the Macross ship must make it's way back to planet Earth. But Hikaru and Minmay are trapped inside the Macross.

episodes.title: Transformation
episodes.plot: Captin Global has ordered the Macross to change to combat mode to fiend off attack waves sent by the Zentradi.

episodes.title: Daedalus Attack
episodes.plot: Misa and Claudia try a new attack strategy the evil Zentradi.

episodes.title: Bye-Bye Mars
episodes.plot: Having discovered an abandoned base on Mars, the Zentradi set up a trap for the Macross. The Macross, already far off the intended course for Earth, makes a stop on Mars for much needed supplies.

episodes.title: Longest Birthday
episodes.plot: Minmay has a birthday and Hikaru gets promoted.

episodes.title: Miss Macross
episodes.plot: A TV station is now running on the Macross. To celebrate they are holding a "Miss Macross" beauty pageant.

episodes.title: Blind Game
episodes.plot: Roli, Konda, and Warera, after having all their recording equipment destroyed by Hikaru, report to Britai and Exedol about the broadcast they witnessed.

episodes.title: First Contact
episodes.plot: Hikaru, Misa and Kakizaki have been captured by the Zentradi.

episodes.title: Big Escape
episodes.plot: Britai, Exedol, and Bodolzaa decide they need to place micloned Zentradi soldiers aboard the Macross as spies.

episodes.title: Blue Wind
episodes.plot: On their return to the Macross, Hikaru, Kakizaki, Max, and Misa give their report to Global and his senior officers.

episodes.title: Global Report
episodes.plot: Captain Global prepares his report for UN Forces Headquarters.

episodes.title: Chinatown
episodes.plot: Misa and Global head to UN Forces Headquarters in Alaska to report their theories regarding the Zentradi.

episodes.title: Kung Fu Dandy
episodes.plot: Kaifun is reunited with his parents. The three spies gradually start adjusting to life with "culture."

episodes.title: Phantasm
episodes.plot: Having been seriously injured in his last battle, Hikaru is lying unconscious in a hospital.

episodes.title: Pineapple Salad
episodes.plot: Hikaru regains consciousness but is being kept in the hospital for monitoring. His first visitor is Misa, who feels guilty for being responsible for Hikaru's injuries.

episodes.title: Burst Point
episodes.plot: Roy is dead and the crew of the Macross has developed an omnidirectional barrier that can shield the entire ship for a brief period of time.

episodes.title: Paradise Lost
episodes.plot: The explosion of the barrier system has not only destroyed most of Kamjin's fleet but decimated.

episodes.title: Micro Cosmos
episodes.plot: It's the premiere of Minmay's movie. She's reserved a seat in the front row for Hikaru but he doesn't get her message.

episodes.title: Love Concert
episodes.plot: During a concert held my Minmay, a battle ensures inside the Macross ship.

episodes.title: Drop Out
episodes.plot: After the attack on the city inside the Macross, the civilians get to work cleaning up. Meanwhile, the military is kept busy fighting off small groups of Zentradi.

episodes.title: Good-bye Girl
episodes.plot: Misa decides to return to the Earth to give her report to the UN Government High Command regarding the Zentradi, using data obtained from the defectors.

episodes.title: Virgin Road
episodes.plot: Max gets in a knife fight with Miliain at the park and she decides to join the Macross team.

episodes.title: Messenger
episodes.plot: Groups of Zentradi mutiny and demand the negotiation of a cease-fire with the Macross. Archivist Exedol is sent as ambassador to the Macross.

episodes.title: Ai wa Nagareru
episodes.plot: Boddole Zer's fleet has over 4,000,000 warships that has folded above earth, but can Minmay's singing help out heroes?

episodes.title: My Album
episodes.plot: Two years have gone by since the battle with Boddole Zer. an the Macross is now in a conflict called the Space War I. Hikaru asks Roy what he should do about his romantic feelings for Minmay and Misa.

episodes.title: Lonely Song
episodes.plot: As more and more Zentradi grow discontented with their current life, a solution must be found.

episodes.title: Viva Maria
episodes.plot: Claudia, Misa, Hikaru, Max, Milia and Exedol are recruited to go with Britai to capture the Zentradi base that manufactures their ships.

episodes.title: Satan's Dolls
episodes.plot: The disgruntled Zentradi are now trying to steal the micloning devices. The military find themselves battling ever increasing numbers of Zentradi.

episodes.title: Broken Heart
episodes.plot: Kamjin captures Minmay and Kaifun and tries to ransom them for a warship. Misa and Hikaru are part of a mission to rescue them.

episodes.title: Rainy Night
episodes.plot: Misa and Claudia talk about the men in their lives over glasses of wine.

episodes.title: Private Time
episodes.plot: Misa and Hikaru have a date for a picnic. However, Minmay calls Hikaru and he flies over to see her without telling Misa.

episodes.title: Romanesque
episodes.plot: It's Christmas time! Kamjin and his group have found a Zentradi warship and are repairing it using techniques learned from the humans.

episodes.title: Yasashisa Sayonara
episodes.plot: Hikaru must decide who he will be with...will it be Misa or Minmay?
